name: rugoe of desert
description:
We try to remember scenes from the lives of happy people who love the life and family of the past in the Middle East who are being forgotten during the war and modernism in the form of a video game for people around the world and the future.

This work illustrates what is left of the tradition in the collective memory and subconscious of the desert people and is being forgotten. Epic scenes from the horror of the Mongol invasion and the victory of hope and love of these people over the razor blades of terror!
